Changes.LogName: Robin's 7-heart event - will Robin be dateable?

Entries.77770001/f Robin 1750/t 0600 2400: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Robin 64 18 0/skippable/pause 1500/speak Robin "Oh, hey, @. I'm glad I caught you.#$b#I need some advice, and since we're good friends now, I wanted to ask your opinion."/pause 500/faceDirection Robin 3/emote Robin 28/pause 1800/faceDirection Robin 0/speak Robin "It's no secret that Demetrius and I haven't been getting along too well for a while now.#$b#We had a long talk last night and I'm not sure how committed he is to working on our marriage.$2"/pause 1000/speak Robin "He made it clear that his work is very important to him.$6"/pause 500/emote Robin 28/pause 500/speak Robin "What do you think I should do, @?" /pause 200/question fork0 "How should we answer?#Explore your options. You can create a great life on your own or with someone else here.#Stick with Demetrius and keep your comfy life together. Why risk being all by yourself?" /fork SingleRobin/pause 500/message "*sigh* You're probably right. Thanks for listening and being such a good friend."/pause 1000/end
Entries.SingleRobin: pause 200/addMailReceived RobinDateable/speak Robin "You know, I think that's what I've already been feeling in my heart. I just needed to hear someone else say it.#$b#My kids are here and I have great friends here.#$b#I can make a wonderful life here! Thanks for the advice, @. I'm feeling really positive about what the future holds!"/pause 500/end

Entries.77770002/f Robin 2000/t 0600 2400: sweet/25 15/farmer 19 17 1 Robin 25 14 3/skippable/pause 1500/speak Robin "Hi @, I was just coming to see you!$1#$b#Do you have a moment? I want to tell you something."/move farmer 0 -2 0 Robin 0 1 2/move farmer 2 0 1 Robin -3 0 3/pause 1000/speak Robin "You know, after everything with Demetrius... I didn't expect to feel anything again, at least not this soon."/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak Robin "I've realized something over the past little while.#$b#You've been an amazing friend to me.#$b#You're super supportive, a great listener and you've provided such thoughtful advice.#$b#We've spent a lot of time together and I... well, I've started to feel something deeper.$2"/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/speak Robin "@... I think I'm in love with you.$7"/emote farmer 16/pause 1000/speak Robin "But no pressure, OK?"/pause 1000/speak Robin "I just wanted to tell you that whatever the future holds, @. I hope you'll always be in my life."/emote farmer 20/pause 1000/speak Robin "So, with that said, um, would you like to head back to your place... and, you know, spend some quality time together?$7"/pause 1000/emote Robin 20 true/emote farmer 20/pause 1000/globalFade .007/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.77770003/f Robin 2000/t 0600 2400: continue/42 13/farmer 42 14 0 Demetrius 42 13 2/skippable/pause 1500/speak Demetrius "Hi, @. Can we talk for a minute?$2" /faceDirection Demetrius 1 true/pause 1000/speak Demetrius "I know this might be a bit awkward, but I just wanted to say that I'm completely cool with you and Robin being together.$2"/pause 1000/faceDirection Demetrius 2 true/speak Demetrius "Our relationship struggled for quite a while.#$b#It was really hard on her.$2"/pause 1000/speak Demetrius "She's a remarkable person, and I'm glad she's found someone who makes her feel loved.$0"/faceDirection Demetrius 1 true/pause 2000/speak Demetrius "I'm actually happy for both of you.#$b#It had to be pretty lonely for you when you moved here.#$b#I'm glad you found someone, too.$0"/faceDirection Demetrius 2 true/pause 1000/speak Demetrius "Thanks for hearing me out, @. I appreciate it and I hope this wasn't too awkward.$0"/pause 1000/speak Demetrius "Hey, let's all grab a coffee sometime.$0#$b#Unless you're afraid I'll try to steal your girl back.$1"/pause 1000/globalFade .003/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.77770004/f Robin 3500/t 1030 1500: sweet/5 20/farmer 6 24 0 Robin 5 18 2/addMailReceived LowerPrices/skippable/pause 1500/speak Robin "Hi, @! I'm so glad you came by.$1"/move farmer 0 -3 0/move farmer -2 0 0/move farmer 0 -3 1/faceDirection Robin 3/emote Robin 20/pause 1000/speak Robin "I just realized something!"/speak Robin "Now that we're a couple, it doesn't make sense for me to charge you for my recipies."/speak Robin "The money just comes back into our household."/speak Robin "Except that Lewis will keep some of it as taxes.$3"/speak Robin "From now on stop in any time I'm here and I'll give you any recipe you want.$0"/speak Robin "I can't believe we didn't think of this sooner!$1"/emote Robin 20 true/emote farmer 20/pause 1000/end
